          <title>
            <string language="fr">Pleine lune</string>
            <string language="en">Full moon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vollmond</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lua cheia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Luna piena</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πλήρες φεγγάρι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Luna Llena</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre le soleil et la lune  placés sur des côtés opposés de la terre de telle façon que la lune semble  entièrement visible de la terre.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the Sun and the Moon positioned on opposite sides of the Earth such that the Moon appears fully visible from Earth.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">La terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">plein</string>
            <string language="en">full</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lune</string>
            <string language="en">Moon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">orbite</string>
            <string language="en">Orbit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">phase</string>
            <string language="en">phase</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">système  solaire</string>
            <string language="en">solar system</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">soleil</string>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Sonne und den Mond, die
auf gegenüberliegende Seiten der Masse so in Position gebracht 
werden, daß der Mond von der Masse völlig sichtbar aussieht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o sol e a lua 
posicionados em lados opostos da terra tais que a lua parece 
inteiramente visível da terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il sole e la luna 
posizionati dai lati opposti della terra tali che la luna sembra 
completamente visibile da terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τον ήλιο και το φεγγάρι 
που τοποθετούνται στις αντίθετες πλευρές της γης έτσι ώστε το 
φεγγάρι εμφανίζεται πλήρως ορατό από τη γη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el sol y la luna 
colocados en las caras opuestas de la tierra tales que la luna aparece
completamente visible de la tierra.</string>
          </description>
